mapper.select: SELECT a.FREE_BOARD_NO, a.MEMBER_ID, a.FREE_TITLE, a.FREE_CONTENT, a.HITS, a.CREATE_DATE, a.MODIFY_DATE, a.STATUS FROM FREE_BOARD a WHERE a.STATUS = 'Y' LIMIT #{firstRecordIndex}, #{pageNumListSize}
SELECT COUNT(FREE_BOARD_NO) FROM FREE_BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT a.FREE_BOARD_NO, a.FREE_TITLE, a.MEMBER_ID, a.CREATE_DATE, a.MODIFY_DATE, a.HITS FROM FREE_BOARD a WHERE a.FREE_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') AND a.STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT a.FREE_BOARD_NO, a.FREE_TITLE, a.MEMBER_ID, a.CREATE_DATE, a.MODIFY_DATE, a.HITS FROM FREE_BOARD a WHERE a.MEMBER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') AND a.STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT FREE_BOARD_NO, MEMBER_ID, FREE_TITLE, FREE_CONTENT, HITS, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, STATUS FROM FREE_BOARD WHERE FREE_BOARD_NO = #{freeBoardNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE FREE_BOARD SET HITS = HITS + 1 WHERE FREE_BOARD_NO = #{freeBoardNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREE_BOARD (MEMBER_ID, FREE_TITLE, FREE_CONTENT) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{freeTitle}, #{freeContent})
mapper.update: UPDATE FREE_BOARD SET FREE_TITLE = #{freeTitle}, FREE_CONTENT = #{freeContent}, MODIFY_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE FREE_BOARD_NO = #{freeBoardNo} AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
UPDATE FREE_BOARD SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE FREE_BOARD_NO = #{freeBoardNo}
